title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe the main function of the legislative branch of government in most countries.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe the selection process of members of the lower or single house of the legislative branch in two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries.

For Task C, the response must correctly Explain the extent to which legislative power is formally constrained in the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in (B).
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes five of the tasks set by the question.
